column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of SrGeO3 were prepared using a solid-state reaction from SrCO3, GeO2 and La2O3.

#Text=Stoichiometric amounts (SrGeO3 for undoped, and (Sr0.95La0.05)GeO3 for La-doped SrGeO3) of the reagents were mixed and calcined at 1,200 째C for 10 h in air under AP to synthesize the AP-phase SrGeO3.
#Text=The AP-phase samples were subjected to high-pressure reactions at 5.5 GPa and 1,100 째C for 1 h, using a belt-type HP apparatus.
#Text=AP- and HP-phase GeO2 (AP-GeO2 and HP-GeO2, respectively) were also synthesized for comparison.
